trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the size of the image on a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> is automatically adjusted to fit on a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> while retaining the original image proportions.
trans-unit.target: Angir om størrelsen på bildet på en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> justeres automatisk for å få plass på en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> under beholde de opprinnelige bildet forhold.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> properties pertain to various aspects of image handling.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A>, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A>Egenskaper som gjelder for forskjellige deler av bildet unntaksbehandlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use images in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controls by setting these properties directly or by setting the run-time–only <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Bruk bilder i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>Kontroller ved å angi egenskapene direkte eller ved å angi det kjøres nå – bare <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: Image scaling is determined by the interaction of properties in both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, as follows: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> is the scale of the final image as determined by the combination of the image's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> setting and the container's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> setting.
trans-unit.target: Bildeskalering er avhengig av samhandling med egenskaper i begge <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, som følger:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A>er skalaen bildets endelig som fastslått av kombinasjonen av bildets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A>innstillingen og beholderen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>innstillingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: - If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> is `true` (the default) and ToolStripItemImageScaling is SizeToFit, no image scaling occurs, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> size is that of the largest item, or a prescribed minimum size.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>er `true` (standard) og ToolStripItemImageScaling SizeToFit, ingen bildeskalering oppstår, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>størrelse er det største elementet, eller en brukt minimumsstørrelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> is `false` and ToolStripItemImageScaling is None, neither image nor <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> scaling occurs.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>er `false` og ToolStripItemImageScaling er None, verken bildet eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>skalering forekommer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: To control the image size, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Bruk til å kontrollere bildestørrelsen den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the size of the image on a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> is not automatically adjusted to fit on a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Angir at størrelsen på bildet på en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> ikke justeres automatisk for å få plass på en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the size of the image on a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> is automatically adjusted to fit on a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Angir at størrelsen på bildet på en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> justeres automatisk for å få plass på en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref>.
